name: Keep Driving: Hard Drive
description:
Keep Driving: Hard Drive is an endless runner emulating the style of 80's synth wave, following the creation of the original Keep Driving, this game is being brought to mobile!

Taking your Ferrari Testarossa Spider (Hu3) for a joyride seemed like a great idea... until it wasn't, Hu3's hardware seems to have started glitching out and now you have no control.

Dodge obstacles and countless cars whilst trying to fight off whatever is making Hu3 go on the fritz, make sure you keep an eye on where you're going and...

Keep Driving

Music source:

Sound effects provided by Zapsplat.com & freesound.org
